channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Simple AL Slider
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Simple AL Slider

item.title: CVE-2024-5729|2024-06-28T06:00:04.527Z -- unknown -- simple%20al%20slider
item.description: The Simple AL Slider WordPress plugin through 1.2.10 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin
